translation.title: The Soul and the Body Are Different Things

previous.name: The Soul and the Body Are Identical

segments.en: 14. The Soul and the Body Are Different Things

segments.pli: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
segments.en: “Mendicants, when what exists, because of grasping what and insisting on what, does the view arise:
‘The soul and the body are different things’?” …

suttaplex.blurb: The view that the soul and the body are different things is given up by seeing the aggregates, as well as what is seen, heard, thought, and known, as impermanent.
